ADLXWrapper
Table of Contents

Class ADLXGPUTuningServicesHelper

Namespace
ADLXWrapper
Assembly
ADLXWrapper.dll

Wrapper over IADLXGPUTuningServices selecting the highest available interface and exposing change handling helpers.

public sealed class ADLXGPUTuningServicesHelper : IDisposable
Inheritance
object
ADLXGPUTuningServicesHelper

IDisposable

Constructors

ADLXGPUTuningServicesHelper(IADLXGPUTuningServices*, bool)

Creates a GPU tuning helper from the native services interface, upgrading to v1 when available.

public ADLXGPUTuningServicesHelper(IADLXGPUTuningServices* services, bool addRef = true)

Parameters

services IADLXGPUTuningServices*

Native GPU tuning services pointer.

addRef bool

True to AddRef the pointer for this helper.

Methods

AddGPUTuningEventListener(GpuTuningChangedCallback)

Adds a GPU tuning change listener.

public GpuTuningListenerHandle AddGPUTuningEventListener(GpuTuningListenerHandle.GpuTuningChangedCallback callback)

Parameters

callback GpuTuningListenerHandle.GpuTuningChangedCallback

Callback invoked on tuning changes.

Returns

GpuTuningListenerHandle

Listener handle that must be disposed to unsubscribe.

If registration fails.
